title: Emerald and Diamond Vanki Bangles - Jadau Style Kangan
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) / American Diamonds. Each gemstone is carefully chosen for its clarity and brilliance.
features: Contemporary Vanki style with a geometric lattice design. Centered with vibrant square emeralds, surrounded by sparkling CZ stones. The openwork setting allows for maximum light reflection, enhancing the brilliance of the stones. Handcrafted with meticulous detail, showcasing the artistry of our skilled artisans.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. These bangles add a touch of regal elegance to any outfit.
description: These stunning bangles offer a modern take on a classic Vanki design, blending traditional craftsmanship with contemporary aesthetics. The vibrant emeralds and sparkling CZs create a mesmerizing effect, making them a true statement piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and durability. An excellent investment piece that can be passed down through generations.
